name: License to Krill
description:
You are an ancient evil space whale!

You want to eat delicious deep space krill and destroy everything!

The space police is after you!

Destroy any ships that cross your path!

License to Krill is an endless runner set in space, see how far you can get!

Controls:

Move:Shoot:w,a,s,d
left click

Credits:

Game Development:

isherzad, Libur

Art/Assets:

SenhorMarco, Felix

UI:

Armandas1C

Music/Sounds:

Armandas1C

Install Instructions:

  1. Download the .zip file
  2. Unzip the folder
  3. Run the game
  4. Get to krillin'

This game was made under the theme "You are the enemy" during the htk GAME JAM 2022 Ice Edition.
